fields.name: HostServiceUri
fields.description: The on-premises integration runtime host URL.

fields.name: IdentityCertThumbprint
fields.description: The integration runtime SSL certificate thumbprint. Click-Once application uses it to do server validation.

fields.name: IsIdentityCertExprired
fields.description: Whether the identity certificate is expired.

fields.name: PublicKey
fields.description: The public key for encrypting a credential when transferring the credential to the integration runtime.

fields.name: ServiceToken
fields.description: The token generated in service. Callers use this token to authenticate to integration runtime.
